title: The English Learning Podcast
description: A weekly show that helps English learners improve their vocabulary, pronunciation, and confidence through practical tips and cultural insights.
author: Hosein Ghasemizade

episodes.title: Episode 1: Mastering Small Talk in English
episodes.description: Learn how to start and keep a conversation going in English with common phrases and cultural tips.

episodes.title: Episode 2: 10 Common Mistakes English Learners Make
episodes.description: We discuss the most frequent grammar and pronunciation mistakes and how to avoid them.
